医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
多样化的口腔微生物群与更好的衰老认知功能之间的惊人联系研究发现，美国老年人较高的口腔微生物组多样性与更好的认知功能和更少的记忆问题有关，凸显了“口腔-大脑轴”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240609/Surprising-link- Between-a-diverse-oral-microbiome-and-better-cognitive-function-in-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240609/Surprising-link- Between-a-diverse-oral-microbiome-and-better-cognitive-function-in-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d1c3435-262a-4679-9b12-ae8c95a1509d Sun, 09 Jun 2024 22:21:00 -0400 Surprising link between a diverse oral microbiome and better cognitive function in aging
足球队进球前的跑动模式揭示了进球成功的关键与失球球队相比，波兰 Ekstraklasa 进球球队在进球前五分钟内表现出明显更高的中低强度跑动，这有助于优化训练策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240609/Soccer-teams-pre-goal-running-patterns-reveal-key-to-scoring-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240609/Soccer-teams-pre-goal-running-patterns-reveal-key-to-scoring-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e587603c-1878-48d3-9101-f6cc6a753690 Sun, 09 Jun 2024 21:29:00 -0400 Soccer teams' pre-goal running patterns reveal key to scoring success
味觉基因会影响我们的饮酒量和体脂吗？研究检查了苦味受体基因的多态性如何与饮酒量和体脂百分比相关，揭示了与 TAS2R13 的显着相关性，但与 TAS2R38 无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240609/Do-taste-genes-influence-how-much-alcohol-we-drink-and-our-body-fat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240609/Do-taste-genes-influence-how-much-alcohol-we-drink-and-our-body-fat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=031ef6f8-7597-4e49-af60-052945839d8b Sun, 09 Jun 2024 20:52:00 -0400 Do taste genes influence how much alcohol we drink and our body fat?
对澳大利亚死亡的根本原因、促成原因和直接原因的新颖见解根据澳大利亚健康与福利研究所 (AIHW) 发布的最新报告，揭示了澳大利亚人最有可能死亡的情况，根据医疗死亡证明中包含的所有信息，2022 年五分之一的死亡与冠心病 (CHD) 有关从。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Novel-insights-into-the-underlying-contributing-and-direct-causes-of-death-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Novel-insights-into-the-underlying-contributing-and-direct-causes-of-death-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d08fd00-09da-46e6-a55f-373b0941110e Sat, 08 Jun 2024 08:06:00 -0400 Novel insights into the underlying, contributing, and direct causes of death in Australia
专家呼吁制定明确的人类胚胎研究规则曼彻斯特大学的两位领先专家认为，必须制定管理人类胚胎研究的明确规则，以使监管机构、研究人员和资助者能够评估干细胞生成的模型是否应被视为人类胚胎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Experts-call-for-clear-rules-governing- human-embryo-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Experts-call-for-clear-rules-governing- human-embryo-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcc41139-0e01-4745-8095-c8edad0a6e3d Sat, 08 Jun 2024 08:02:00 -0400 Experts call for clear rules governing human embryo research
Berotralstat：使用正常 C1 抑制剂治疗遗传性血管性水肿的一种有前途的口服疗法BioCryst Pharmaceuticals, Inc. 今天宣布了新的真实世界证据，表明 C1 抑制剂 (HAE-nC1-INH) 水平和功能正常的遗传性血管性水肿 (HAE) 患者在开始口服、一次-每日贝罗特拉统计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Berotralstat-A-promising-oral-treatment-for-hereditary-angioedema-with-normal-C1-inhibitor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Berotralstat-A-promising-oral-treatment-for-hereditary-angioedema-with-normal-C1-inhibitor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7f11adb-eb20-4e76-9dbb-971e501003bc Sat, 08 Jun 2024 07:56:00 -0400 Berotralstat: A promising oral treatment for hereditary angioedema with normal C1-inhibitor
多西环素有望减少点头综合征引起的死亡和癫痫发作一项新的研究表明，一个疗程的多西环素药物可以减少与急性癫痫发作相关的住院治疗和与点头综合征相关的死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Doxycycline-shows-promise-in-reducing-deaths-and-seizures-from-nodding-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Doxycycline-shows-promise-in-reducing-deaths-and-seizures-from-nodding-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e42adc9a-149f-47dd-99c5-f2d472af1903 Sat, 08 Jun 2024 07:47:00 -0400 Doxycycline shows promise in reducing deaths and seizures from nodding syndrome
世卫组织和 FIND 联手加速诊断创新和获取FIND 和世界卫生组织 (WHO) 签署了一份新的谅解备忘录 (MoU)，为加速创新和实现全球人民公平获得优质诊断服务奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/WHO-and-FIND-join-forces-to-accelerate-diagnostic-innovation-and-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/WHO-and-FIND-join-forces-to-accelerate-diagnostic-innovation-and-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=438413f6-6fcc-4eda-98e2-ede7a1d4d4d3 Sat, 08 Jun 2024 07:44:00 -0400 WHO and FIND join forces to accelerate diagnostic innovation and access
研究表明全球精子数量可能不会下降根据曼彻斯特大学、加拿大金斯顿女王大学和丹麦 Cryos International 的一项新研究，人们普遍认为世界各地男性精子数量正在下降，这一观点可能是错误的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Sperm-counts-may-not-be-declined-globally-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Sperm-counts-may-not-be-declined-globally-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b353b96a-ad46-4a36-a30e-0a8201ddade5 Sat, 08 Jun 2024 07:41:00 -0400 Sperm counts may not be declining globally, study suggests
新算法通过针对特定症状增强帕金森氏症的深部脑刺激麻省布里格姆总医院的研究人员确定了可以优化帕金森病症状特异性治疗的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/New-algorithm-enhances-deep-brain-stimulation-for-Parkinsons-by-targeting-specific-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/New-algorithm-enhances-deep-brain-stimulation-for-Parkinsons-by-targeting-specific-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8a8ae70-d0d0-45c6-b9db-578ad054d61f Sat, 08 Jun 2024 07:39:00 -0400 New algorithm enhances deep brain stimulation for Parkinson's by targeting specific symptoms
